verbs.description: rothenberg [V: sentenced] [ARG1: 25 years to life] [ARGM-LOC: under three - strike law] lee ruled today that the arson and attempted murder convictions are in fact two strikes and that the two convictions for possessing weapons are a third strike the case was sent back to the lower court because the appeals court instead of imposing a 25 year to life sentence itself ordered a new sentencing hearing in san francisco superior court charles is also accused of credit card fraud and of using a jail telephone three times in 2005 to make threats against matthews an appeals court however ruled in january that they were both strikes because they involved multiple acts and multiple victims francisco police department san francisco police department san francisco charles rothenberg charley charles rothenberg
